definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: Onchocerciasis is limited to six Latin American countries.
sentences.chinese: 盤尾絲蟲病僅在6個拉丁美洲國家存在。

sentences.english: Latin America has a couple of candidates, but they are trailing.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁美洲有許多候選人，但是他們正在落後。

sentences.english: They knew my work as a religious producer in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道我在拉丁美洲地區是一名宗教製片人。

sentences.english: One striking example of shrinking diversity is Latin America's beans.
sentences.chinese: 多樣性減少的一個驚人例子就是拉丁美洲的豆類。

sentences.english: Similarly, large cross country differences are reported in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 同樣，拉丁美洲國家之間的差異也很大。

sentences.english: It was imported from Latin America to South East Asia in the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 它是二十世紀八十年代從拉丁美洲進口到東南亞的。

sentences.english: Senate zeroed in on the Latin-American problems.
sentences.chinese: 參議院把注意力集中在拉丁美洲問題上。

sentences.english: Latin America is home to a wealth of traditional medicines.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁美洲是一批傳統醫學財富的故鄉。

sentences.english: This time Southeast Asia and Latin America are ceding the dishonors to Eastern Europe.
sentences.chinese: 這次，東南亞和拉丁美洲在看東歐的笑話。

sentences.english: He disappeared to the Latin America.
Species names and other Latin terms should be typed in italics .
sentences.chinese: 物種名稱和其他拉丁美洲條款應當打字楷體字。

sentences.english: The state is weak, even by Latin American standards.
sentences.chinese: 即使用拉丁美洲的標準衡量，危地馬拉積弱難返。

sentences.english: How to do business with LatAm?
sentences.chinese: 如何有效在拉丁美洲做生意？

sentences.english: Don`t you think it would be more productive to find a handsome Latino who isn`t old enough to be your grandfather?
sentences.chinese: 你不覺得找個拉丁美洲的年輕帥小夥兒會更好麼？
恰恰舞起源於拉丁美洲。

sentences.english: The plantations of Latin America are large, privately owned estates worked by tenant labor.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁美洲的大莊園就是大片的私有土地，僱人勞動。

definition: Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]

pinyin: Sa1 ha1 la1 yi3 nan2 Fei1 zhou1
